title: Rod Vagg: A Real Database Rethink: "Introducing LevelDB and Node.JS" NodeconfEU2013
description:
The term "database" has a lot of baggage but it essentially refers to a tool, external to our applications, that we use for persistence, performance and shared access. 
This talk introduces the new and vibrant ecosystem of Node Databases, inspired by "LevelDB". 
Taking a cue from "Node.js" philosophy, Node Databases are built around a small, extensible core of storage primitives with a rapidly growing list of extensions that provide more complex functionality.
